SELECT ROD.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID, RII.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID AS RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID, R.RWMATR_ID AS RWMATR_ID, R.NM AS NM, RII.DT AS DT, ROD.QY AS QY, RII.PASS_QY AS PASS_QY, RII.INFER_QY AS INFER_QY, RII.MNGR AS MNGR, RII.REMK AS REMK, CM.MBER_NM AS MBER_NM, RI.INFER_ID AS INFER_ID, IC.DETA AS DETA FROM RWMATR_IST_INSP RII JOIN RWMATR R ON RII.RWMATR_ID = R.RWMATR_ID JOIN RWMATR_ORDER_DETA ROD ON ROD.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID = RII.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID JOIN RWMATR_INFER RI ON RI.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID = RII.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID JOIN INFER_CODE IC ON IC.INFER_ID = RI.INFER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MBER_ID, MBER_NM, ESNTL_ID FROM COMTNGNRLMBER WHERE MBER_STTUS = 'P' ORDER BY MBER_NM) CM ON RII.MNGR = CM.ESNTL_ID
TRUNC(RII.DT) >= to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(RII.DT) <= to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND R.NM LIKE '%'||#{rwmName}||'%'
AND CM.MBER_NM LIKE '%'||#{mngr}||'%'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT ROD.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID, ROD.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID AS RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID, R.NM AS NM, ROD.RWMATR_ID AS RWMATR_ID, ROD.QY AS QY, RII.MNGR AS MNGR FROM RWMATR_IST_INSP RII RIGHT JOIN RWMATR_ORDER_DETA ROD ON RII.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID = ROD.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RWMATR R ON R.RWMATR_ID = ROD.RWMATR_ID WHERE RII.FG IS NULL ORDER BY 2 DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RWMATR_IST_INSP( RWMATR_ID, DT, PASS_QY, INFER_QY, MNGR, REMK, RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID ) VALUES( #{rwmatrId}, #{dt}, #{passQy}, #{inferQy}, #{mngr}, #{remk}, #{rwmatrOrderDetaId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE RWMATR_IST_INSP SET RWMATR_ID = #{rwmatrId}, DT = #{dt}, PASS_QY = #{passQy}, INFER_QY = #{inferQy}, MNGR = #{mngr}, REMK = #{remk} WHERE RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID = #{rwmatrOrderDetaId}
UPDATE RWMATR_IST_INSP SET FG = 'N' WHERE RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID = #{rwmatrOrderDetaId}
UPDATE RWMATR_IST_INSP SET FG = 'Y' WHERE RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID = #{rwmatrOrderDetaId}
